description.definition: A description of this hardware item.

detektor_type.definition: The kind of detektor used in this eyetracker.

filter.definition: The kind of filter applied to the data.

fixation.definition: The way the head was fixed. Makes no sense if the eytracker is head mounted.

inventory_no.definition: The inventory number of the device.

manufacturer.definition: The Manufacturer of this hardware item.

model.definition: The model name of this hardware item.

owner.definition: Who's the owner of the device.

sample_rate.definition: The rate with which eye positions are sampled.
